message: Let's split fairly, I get a bit more
I think this is a fair split, given that you'll be getting all of the money if we don't reach an agreement in the next 11 rounds.
I'll give you a bit less, considering your last offer
This is my final offer. I'm willing to give you a little more than last time, but I need to get a fair share.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it
Let's split it down the middle, I think it's fair given how the money is losing value.
Splitting down the middle doesn't account for my patience
I'm willing to compromise a little more, but I need to get a decent share of the money.
You're getting desperate, I can tell
